title: About
body: EASEOUT was launched in February 2020 by Tim Robards in Montreal, Canada. We're a web design & development blog showcasing design inspiration found all over the internet. As well as publishing articles and tutorials about the latest web trends, technologies & possibilities. The website runs on [Netlify](https://netlify.com) and is built with Vue & Nuxt. **FAQS:** * **Q:** Can I advertise? **A:** Yes! Email hello@easeout.co * **Q:** Can I submit my website? **A:** Sure can! Email hello@easeout.co * **Q:** How can I keep up with everything? **A**: Join the newsletter & follow us on twitter! * **Q:** How can I show some love? **A:** You could [buymeacoffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/iNrSbC8kz) :) Your suggestions & feedback are welcome! I always aim to bring new features & improve your user experience. \- Tim
